plays.text: Penalty to Jarome Iginla 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding the Stick Scott Parker
Penalty to Denis Gauthier 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Eric Messier 2 minutes for Interference Scott Nichol
Penalty to Martin Skoula 2 minutes for Hooking Oleg Saprykin

Penalty to Derek Morris 5 minutes for Fighting Martin Gelinas
Penalty to Martin Gelinas 5 minutes for Fighting Derek Morris
Goal scored by Oleg Saprykin assisted by Jarome Iginla and Chris Drury
Penalty to Roman Turek 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified) served by Craig Berube
Penalty to D.J. Smith 2 minutes for High Sticking Craig Conroy
Goal scored by Craig Conroy assisted by Martin Gelinas and Rob Niedermayer
Penalty to Craig Conroy 2 minutes for Crosschecking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Radim Vrbata assisted by Martin Skoula and Eric Messier
